p: Come join a Startup digital team who is changing the future of the farming space and helping the world to become more sustainable. This agricultural giant is looking for an experienced Data Scientist who can build next generation advanced analytics.

li: Analyze raw data: assessing quality, cleansing, structuring for downstream processing
li.1: Design accurate and scalable prediction algorithms
li.2: Collaborate with engineering team to bring analytical prototypes to production
li.3: Generate actionable insights for business improvements

li: Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience in quantitative field (Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Engineering, etc.)
li.1: At least 2-3 years' of experience in quantitative analytics or data modeling
li.2: Deep understanding of predictive modeling, machine-learning, clustering and classification techniques, and algorithms
li.3: Fluency in a programming language (Python, R)
li.4: Familiarity with Big Data frameworks and visualization tools (Hadoop, Spark, Hive)

p.6: This will be a *Remote* role with the preferred candidate located in Central Time Zone
